mapper.select: SELECT cl_no, cl_title, cl_sungjang, cl_sang, cl_jangdan, cl_jiwon, cl_check FROM UserCl WHERE cl_no = #{clNo};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO usercl ( cl_no, cl_title, cl_sungjang, cl_sang, cl_jangdan, cl_jiwon, cl_check, reg_id, reg_dt ) VALUES ( #{clNo}, #{clTitle}, #{clSungjang}, #{clSang}, #{clJangdan}, #{clJiwon}, #{clCheck}, #{regId}, sysdate );
mapper.update: UPDATE usercl SET cl_title = #{clTitle}, cl_sungjang = #{clSungjang}, cl_sang = #{clSang}, cl_jangdan = #{clJangdan}, cl_jiwon = #{clJiwon}, cl_check = #{clCheck}, mod_id = #{modId}, mod_dt = sysdate WHERE cl_no = #{clNo};
